virtualTable.name: ways_wheelchair
virtualTable.sql: WITH variables AS ( SELECT select_from_variable_container('categories_smoothness_no_wheelchair') AS categories_smoothness_no_wheelchair, select_from_variable_container('categories_smoothness_limited_wheelchair') AS categories_smoothness_limited_wheelchair, select_from_variable_container('categories_surface_no_wheelchair') AS categories_surface_no_wheelchair, select_from_variable_container('categories_highway_onstreet_wheelchair_yes') AS categories_highway_onstreet_wheelchair_yes, select_from_variable_container('categories_highway_onstreet_wheelchair_limited') AS categories_highway_onstreet_wheelchair_limited, select_from_variable_container('excluded_class_id_walking') AS excluded_class_id_walking, select_from_variable_container('categories_no_foot') AS categories_no_foot, select_from_variable_container('categories_sidewalk_no_foot') AS categories_sidewalk_no_foot ) SELECT wheelchair, sidewalk, sidewalk_both_width, sidewalk_left_width, sidewalk_right_width, highway, surface, width, smoothness,w.geom, CASE WHEN wheelchair IN ('yes','Yes') OR ( sidewalk IN ('both','left','right') AND ( sidewalk_both_width >= 1.80 OR sidewalk_left_width >= 1.80 OR sidewalk_right_width >= 1.80 ) ) OR (wheelchair IS NULL AND width >= 1.80 AND highway <> 'steps' AND (smoothness IS NULL OR smoothness NOT IN (SELECT UNNEST(categories_smoothness_no_wheelchair) FROM variables)) AND (surface IS NULL OR surface NOT IN (SELECT UNNEST(categories_surface_no_wheelchair) FROM variables)) ) OR (wheelchair IS NULL AND highway IN (SELECT UNNEST(categories_highway_onstreet_wheelchair_yes) FROM variables)) THEN 'yes' WHEN wheelchair IN ('limited','Limited') OR ( sidewalk IN ('both','left','right') AND ( (sidewalk_both_width < 1.80 OR sidewalk_left_width < 1.80 OR sidewalk_right_width < 1.80 OR (sidewalk_both_width IS NULL AND sidewalk_left_width IS NULL AND sidewalk_right_width IS NULL) ) ) OR (wheelchair IS NULL AND width >= 0.90 AND highway <> 'steps' AND (smoothness IS NULL OR smoothness NOT IN (SELECT UNNEST(categories_smoothness_limited_wheelchair) FROM variables)) AND (surface IS NULL OR surface NOT IN (SELECT UNNEST(categories_surface_no_wheelchair) FROM variables)) )) OR (wheelchair IS NULL AND highway IN (SELECT UNNEST(categories_highway_onstreet_wheelchair_limited) FROM variables)) THEN 'limited' WHEN wheelchair IN ('no','No') --OR ( sidewalk IN ('both','left','right') --AND ( --((sidewalk_both_width < 0.90 OR sidewalk_both_width IS NULL) --AND (sidewalk_left_width < 0.90 OR sidewalk_left_width IS NULL) --AND (sidewalk_right_width < 0.90 OR sidewalk_right_width IS NULL) --) --) OR (wheelchair IS NULL AND (width < 0.90 OR highway = 'steps' OR smoothness IN (SELECT UNNEST(categories_smoothness_limited_wheelchair) FROM variables) AND surface IN (SELECT UNNEST(categories_surface_no_wheelchair) FROM variables)) )--) THEN 'no' ELSE 'unclassified' END AS wheelchair_classified FROM ways w, study_area s WHERE class_id::text NOT IN (SELECT UNNEST(excluded_class_id_walking) FROM variables) AND (foot IS NULL OR foot NOT IN (SELECT UNNEST(categories_no_foot) FROM variables)) AND (sidewalk IS NULL OR sidewalk NOT IN (SELECT UNNEST(categories_sidewalk_no_foot) FROM variables)) AND ST_Intersects(s.geom,w.geom)
